configurable.i18n_name: ROXANNE WITH SELF LASERED SQUIGGLE AND SWAROVSKI YUMBERRY
configurable.i18n_name_de: ROXANNE WITH SELF LASERED SQUIGGLE AND SWAROVSKI YUMBERRY
configurable.i18n_name_nl: ROXANNE WITH SELF LASERED SQUIGGLE AND SWAROVSKI YUMBERRY

configurable.i18n_name_es: ROXANNE WITH SELF LASERED SQUIGGLE AND SWAROVSKI YUMBERRY
configurable.i18n_description: The Roxanne Self Lasered Squiggle and Swarovski Yumberry brings A very expensive brand’s classic slim fit for women together with an alternative black stretch denim. The Roxanne fit has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening and with an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked look. 7FAM’s Yumberry wash breaks with black denim convention, boasting a subtle vintage character while Swarovski crystal embellishment injects luxe femininity. Team this perfect party jean with an edgy blouse or rock tee for easy-peasy glamour.
configurable.i18n_description_de:
• Die Roxanne Self Lasered Squiggle and Swarovski Yumberry vereint A very expensive brands klassische Slim Fit für Damen mit einem alternativen schwarzen Stretch-Denim
  • Roxanne hat eine natürliche Bundhöhe, eine schmale Beinöffnung und geht bis knapp über den Knöchel
  • absolut perfekt für den topmodischen Zwiebel-Look
  • 7FAMs Yumberry Wash bricht mit der Black-Denim-Konvention und sorgt für einen dezenten Vintage-Look
  • Swarovski-Kristallverzierungen hauchen der Jeans luxuriöse Feminität ein
  • kombinieren Sie diese perfekte Partyjeans mit einer auffälligen Bluse oder einem Rock-T-Shirt für Pillepalle-Glamour
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Roxanne Self Lasered Squiggle and Swarovski Yumberry combineert de klassieke slim fit voor vrouwen van A very expensive brand met een alternatieve zwarte stretch denim. De Roxanne heeft een natuurlijke heuplijn, smalle pijpen en een binnenbeenlengte die iets langer is dan de enkellengte, perfect voor een gekreukte look. De Yumberry-wassing van 7FAM breekt met de gebruikelijke zwarte denim en geeft een subtiel vintage karakter, terwijl de versieringen met Swarovski-kristal luxueuze vrouwelijkheid toevoegen. Combineer deze perfecte partyjeans met een gewaagde blouse of een cool T-shirt voor vlotte glamour.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le Roxanne version Yumberry avec logo travaillé au laser rehaussé de strass Swarovski décline le jean slim original de A very expensive brand pour femme dans un denim noir stretch qui joue clairement la carte de l’originalité. Resserré en bas, il repose sur la taille naturelle et tombe parfaitement pour un effet accordéon, grâce à une longueur de jambe dépassant légèrement la cheville. Le lavage Yumberry de 7FAM révolutionne le denim noir grâce à son aspect discrètement rétro et ses strass Swarosvki qui apportent une touche de luxe et de féminité. Mariez ce jean à l’âme festive à un chemisier tendance ou un T-shirt rock’n’roll pour un look naturellement glamour.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Roxanne Self Lasered Squiggle and Swarovski Yumberry veste il classico slim da donna di A very expensive brand di un denim nero stretch e alternativo. Il modello Roxanne, con vita normale e gamba stretta che arriva appena sotto la caviglia, è l’ideale per un look all’ultimo grido. Stop alle convenzioni con il lavaggio Yumberry: il denim nero assume un’allure vintage, mentre i cristalli Swarovski aggiungono un tocco di lusso e femminilità. Un abbinamento vincente? Una blusa dalle linee decise o una t-shirt stile rock per un look glamour facile da portare. Via libera al divertimento!
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Roxanne Self Lasered Squiggle and Swarovski Yumberry brings A very expensive brand’s classic slim fit for women together with an alternative black stretch denim. The Roxanne fit has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening and with an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked look. 7FAM’s Yumberry wash breaks with black denim convention, boasting a subtle vintage character while Swarovski crystal embellishment injects luxe femininity. Team this perfect party jean with an edgy blouse or rock tee for easy-peasy glamour.

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The Roxanne is our classic slim fit featuring the A very expensive brand signature squiggle. It has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked rolled look. This style is also offered in our mid rise version.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de: The Roxanne is our classic slim fit featuring the A very expensive brand signature squiggle. It has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked rolled look. This style is also offered in our mid rise version.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De Roxanne is onze klassieke slim fit met de karakteristieke squiggle van A very expensive brand. Deze jeans heeft een natuurlijke heuplijn en smalle pijpen. Met een binnenbeenlengte die iets langer is dan de enkellengte, is deze broek perfect voor een gekreukte look. Dit model is ook verkrijgbaar met een middelhoge heuplijn.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le Roxanne est l’incarnation du jean slim classique, orné du logo brodé de A very expensive brand. Resserré en bas, il repose sur la taille naturelle et tombe parfaitement pour un effet accordéon, grâce à une longueur de jambe dépassant légèrement la cheville. Ce modèle est également disponible en version taille mi-haute.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Roxanne è il classico slim con logo ricamato di A very expensive brand. Questo modello ha vita normale e gamba stretta che arriva appena sotto la caviglia. Non dimenticate di arrotolare l’orlo per un look all’ultimo grido. Disponibile anche in versione a vita media.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The Roxanne is our classic slim fit featuring the A very expensive brand signature squiggle. It has a natural rise and a narrow leg opening. With an inseam slightly longer than ankle length, it’s perfect for a stacked rolled look. This style is also offered in our mid rise version.
